sentences.en: And this Psalm is helping us define happiness.
sentences.cn: 这篇诗帮助我们了解什么是快乐.

sentences.en: As I sit in a bush, I'll sing a psalm.
sentences.cn: 我将坐落在矮树丛间, 唱出赞美诗.

sentences.en: As she sat on a bush, I'll sing psalm.
sentences.cn: 当他埋入灌木丛中, 我将唱赞美诗.

sentences.en: He recited a verse of the twenty-third psalm.
sentences.cn: 他背诵了《诗篇》第23篇中的一节。

sentences.en: Like the others, they lived up to the resolute sentiment of Longfellow's " Psalm of Life ".
sentences.cn: 他们和别人一样, 当得起朗费罗在《生命颂 》 中所描绘的崇高情操.

sentences.en: Psalm . A Song at the dedication of the house of David.
sentences.cn: 大卫在献殿的时候,作这诗歌.

sentences.en: Psalm 147:3 He heals the brokenhearted And binds up their wounds.
sentences.cn: 诗篇147:3他医好伤心的人、裹好他们的伤处.

sentences.en: Psalm 45 is a celebration of God's great and blessed king.
sentences.cn: 《诗篇》45篇是歌颂神伟大蒙祝福的君王.

sentences.en: The choir sang the 23 rd Psalm.
sentences.cn: 唱诗班唱《旧约·诗篇》之第23篇.

sentences.en: The clergyman began droning ( out ) the psalm.
sentences.cn: 牧师开始以单调而低沉的语调吟诵赞美诗.

sentences.en: The clergyman began droning the psalm.
sentences.cn: 牧师开始以单调而低沈的语调吟诵赞美诗.

sentences.en: The minister droned out the psalm.
The parson droned out the psalm.
sentences.cn: 牧师以单调而低沉的声音诵赞美诗.

sentences.en: This psalm talks about how God should be praised.
sentences.cn: 这篇诗篇说到该怎样来赞美神.

sentences.en: You can find this psalm in the Bible.
sentences.cn: 你可以在圣经上找到这篇赞美诗.

words.tran_cn: 赞美诗；圣歌吟唱；赞美诗集

trans.tran_cn: 赞美诗，圣诗，圣歌，(<圣经旧约>中的)<诗篇>
trans.tran_en: a song or poem praising God, especially in the Bible
